summary: This is an email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, Public Affairs division, dated January 10, 2020. It references a television program titled 'Truth and Lies: Jeffrey Epstein' that aired the previous night and garnered approximately 3.5 million viewers, with a report attached.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: He is the central subject of the television program 'Truth and Lies: Jeffrey Epstein' which aired and is being reported on in this email.

events.title: Air date of 'Truth and Lies: Jeffrey Epstein'
events.description: A television program titled 'Truth and Lies: Jeffrey Epstein' aired, receiving about 3.5 million viewers.

keyFacts: A television program about Jeffrey Epstein titled 'Truth and Lies: Jeffrey Epstein' aired on or around January 9, 2020.
The program received approximately 3.5 million viewers.
The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York's Public Affairs division is monitoring and reporting on public coverage of the Epstein case.
